name: gitosis

gitosis/backup_prefix.description: The prefix of the filename stored in S3 for backups.

aws/secret_access_key.description: This is an Amazon credential. Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve your access identifiers. Ex: XVdxPgOM4auGcMlPz61IZGotpr9LzzI07tT8s2Ws

gitosis/gitosis_home.description: The full path to the home directory for Gitosis

aws/access_key_id.description: This is an Amazon credential. Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve you access identifiers. Ex: 1JHQQ4KVEVM02KVEVM02

gitosis/s3_bucket.description: The namne of the S3 bucket for backups.

gitosis/gitosis_key.description: Private RSA (or DSA) key material to be used when initializing the gitosis repository/home. Set to ignore for a new key to be automatically generated.

gitosis/backup_history_to_keep.description: The number of S3 backups to keep as history.

= USAGE:

recipes.gitosis::enable_continuous_backup: Sets up a cron job to run the gitosis::s3_backup recipe daily
recipes.gitosis::s3_backup: Backs up all gitosis files to an S3 bucket
recipes.gitosis::s3_restore: Restores all gitosis files from an S3 bucket
recipes.gitosis::install: Installs gitosis in the specified directory
recipes.gitosis::disable_continuous_backup: Kills the cron job which runs gitosis::s3_backup daily
